column4: i need help using a dvd rom  with ubuntu 8.10..nothings coming up
i kinda wanna go back to windows xp or vista...but idn were to anyone no how?
i f'ed up and deleted windows wen i dl'ed ubuntu..
is it really that big of a problem ;)
well if i read correctly and yo accidentally deleted your windows partition?
you can get something akin to @active undelete (don't use that, it sucks)
good luck getting it back because 10 to 1 you probably wrote over everything that used to be in the windows partition.
do you still have a windows disk?

well... this may get you started...  if you wish to regain any important data, you may want to stop using the HDD until you can put it in another system as a slave, using windows, and then try one of many utilities.. . http://www.google.com/search?q=undelete+a+ntfs+partition
this may also be of some help.. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vCapEFNZAJ0&feature=PlayList&p=E470E7505DE52C20
if you want to maximize the data you can recover... stop using the drive immediately.
remember, you can run ubuntu from the cd... in live mode.
pls don't you could get a ticket
